rewards.name: White Pass Value
rewards.earningText: Milestone-based White Pass rewards. No rewards below ₹3 lakh annual spend. Earn up to ₹2.5 lakh White Pass on ₹1 crore spend.
rewards.expiry: Valid until 90 days after anniversary cycle
rewards.joiningBonus: Club Marriott Membership with 3 Celebration Certificates
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Wallet, Rent, Govt, Insurance, Utilities, Education excluded from milestone calculation. W.e.f June 2025: 1% fee on Wallet/Gaming above ₹10K/month, Utilities above ₹75K/month, Fuel above ₹50K/month

calculator.specialLogic: White Pass is earned via ANNUAL SPEND MILESTONES (not per-transaction). Milestones: ₹3L→₹5K, ₹10L→+₹15K (total ₹20K), ₹20L→+₹22K (₹42K), ₹30L→+₹24K (₹66K), ₹40L→+₹26K (₹92K), ₹50L→+₹28K (₹1.2L), ₹75L→+₹63K (₹1.83L), ₹1Cr→+₹67K (₹2.5L). No rewards if spend <₹3L. Redemption: 1 White Pass = ₹1 on catalog, ₹0.70 for cashback.

redemption.bestOption: White Pass Catalog (1:1 redemption for vouchers, flights, hotels, experiences)

options.desc: 1 White Pass = ₹1 on vouchers, flights, hotels, experiences

metadata.bestFor: Ultra HNIs with ₹10L+ annual spends seeking luxury travel, lounge, and lifestyle benefits
metadata.verdict: India's top milestone-based super-premium card with unmatched lounge access and Club Marriott perks, but requires ₹3L minimum spend to unlock any rewards.
pros: Unlimited domestic and international lounge access for primary and add-on
Up to 2.5% value back on ₹1 crore spend
Club Marriott membership with dining and stay discounts
2 complimentary golf rounds per month worldwide
cons: No rewards below ₹3 lakh annual spend
Very high ₹12,500 annual fee requires ₹10L spend for waiver

rewards.name: White Pass Value
rewards.earningText: Milestone-based White Pass rewards. Earn up to ₹27,000 White Pass annually on ₹12 lakh spend. Minimum ₹2 lakh spend required to unlock rewards.
rewards.expiry: Expires on card anniversary date + 90 days claim period
rewards.joiningBonus: ₹1,500 White Pass on spending ₹30,000 within 60 days of card setup
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Wallet, Rent, Govt, Insurance, Utilities, EMI transactions. W.e.f June 2025: 1% fee on Wallet/Gaming above ₹10K/month, Utilities above ₹75K/month, Fuel above ₹50K/month

calculator.specialLogic: White Pass is earned via ANNUAL SPEND MILESTONES. Maximum ₹27,000 White Pass annually on ₹12 lakh spend (~2.25% value back). Minimum ₹2 lakh spend required to start earning. Redemption: 1 White Pass = ₹1 on catalog.

redemption.bestOption: White Pass Catalog (1:1 redemption for vouchers, flights, hotels)

options.desc: 1 White Pass = ₹1 on vouchers, flights, hotels, National Geographic experiences

metadata.bestFor: High spenders seeking milestone-based White Pass rewards with domestic and international lounge access
metadata.verdict: A solid premium card for high spenders but complex milestone structure and ₹2L minimum spend requirement limit its appeal compared to simpler reward cards.
pros: Up to 2.25% value back on ₹12L annual spend
cons: Minimum ₹2L spend required to unlock any rewards
White Pass expires on anniversary date
3.5% forex markup is on higher side

fees.waiverText: Joining fee waived on ₹30K spend in 90 days. Annual fee waived on ₹1 lakh spend

rewards.name: Mojo Points
rewards.earningText: 2.5 Mojo Points per ₹100 on online spends (1% value). 1 Mojo Point per ₹100 on other spends (0.4% value). No rewards on fuel or cash withdrawal.
rewards.joiningBonus: 2,500 Mojo Points quarterly on ₹75,000 spend (1st year only)
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Cash Withdrawal. W.e.f June 2025: Education & Insurance earn only up to ₹70K/statement cycle. Wallet/Gaming, Utility, Fuel excluded from milestone calculation.

calculator.specialLogic: 2.5x Mojo Points on all online spends. 1x on offline spends excluding fuel. 1 Mojo Point = ₹0.25 on catalog, ₹0.20 for cashback. Minimum 2,500 points for redemption.

redemption.bestOption: Kotak Rewards Catalog for shopping, travel, vouchers

options.desc: 1 Mojo Point = ₹0.25 on shopping, travel, vouchers

lounge.domestic: 8 per year (2 per quarter, requires ₹75K quarterly spend from June 2025)

metadata.bestFor: Frequent online shoppers seeking basic rewards with domestic lounge access
metadata.verdict: A decent entry-level rewards card with accelerated online earnings, but the 0.4% offline reward rate is underwhelming compared to competitors.
cons: Low 0.4% reward rate on offline spends
Quarterly milestone bonus only for 1st year

rewards.name: Zen Points
rewards.earningText: 10 Zen Points per ₹150 on shopping (apparel, jewellery, lifestyle, departmental stores) = 1.67%. 5 Zen Points per ₹150 on other spends = 0.83%. Capped at 6,500 points per billing cycle.
rewards.joiningBonus: 1,500 Zen Points on payment of joining fee (worth ₹375)
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Cash, EMI transactions. W.e.f June 2025: Wallet/Gaming, Utility, Fuel, Insurance, Govt, Rent, Education excluded from milestone calculation.

calculator.specialLogic: 10 Zen Points/₹150 on SHOPPING CATEGORIES (Apparel, Lifestyle, Jewellery, Departmental Stores). 5 Zen Points/₹150 on other spends. Monthly cap of 6,500 Zen Points (~₹1,625 value). Redemption: 1 Zen Point = ₹0.25 catalog, ₹0.20 cashback.

redemption.bestOption: Kotak Rewards Catalog for shopping, travel, vouchers

options.desc: 1 Zen Point = ₹0.25 on shopping, travel, mobile recharge

lounge.domestic: 8 per year (2 per quarter, requires ₹75K quarterly spend from June 2025)

milestones.benefit: 15,000 bonus Zen Points (₹3,750 value) - replaces ₹3L milestone

metadata.bestFor: Frequent shoppers at apparel, lifestyle, and departmental stores seeking accelerated rewards
metadata.verdict: An excellent shopping-focused card with 1.67% value on lifestyle purchases and solid lounge access, but the monthly cap limits high spenders.
pros: 1.67% value on shopping categories (apparel, lifestyle, jewellery)
Milestone bonuses up to 15,000 points on ₹6L spend
cons: 6,500 points monthly cap limits earning potential
Quarterly spend required for lounge access from June 2025

fees.waiverText: No waiver available. First year joining fee free.

rewards.name: Movie Tickets (M-Coupons)
rewards.earningText: 1 free PVR INOX movie ticket (₹300 value) for every ₹10,000 spent per month. Unlimited tickets possible. 5% instant discount on PVR tickets. 20% off on F&B at PVR.
rewards.expiry: M-Coupons valid for 60 days from claim date. Must claim within 2 billing cycles.
rewards.exclusions: Rent Payments, Wallet Funding, Online Skill-Based Gaming excluded from milestone calculation. 1% fee on Rent, Education, and on Wallet/Gaming above ₹10K, Utility above ₹50K, Fuel above ₹35K monthly.

calculator.specialLogic: MOVIE TICKET MILESTONE: Earn 1 M-Coupon (worth ₹300) for every ₹10,000 spent in a monthly billing cycle. No limit on tickets. E.g., ₹75,000 spend = 7 tickets (₹2,100 value = 2.8%). Additional 5% off on PVR tickets and 20% off on F&B at PVR cinemas. Access to PVR INOX In-Cinema Lounges.

redemption.bestOption: PVR INOX movie tickets via M-Coupons

options.desc: 1 M-Coupon = ₹300 towards any PVR INOX movie ticket

milestones.benefit: 1 free PVR INOX ticket (₹300 value) per month
2 free PVR INOX tickets per month
10 free PVR INOX tickets per month

movies.text: 5% instant discount on PVR INOX tickets. 20% off on F&B. Free In-Cinema Lounge access.

metadata.bestFor: Movie enthusiasts who frequently watch films at PVR INOX cinemas
metadata.verdict: The ultimate card for PVR regulars with unlimited free tickets, instant discounts, and F&B savings. Great value if you love movies, but limited use outside entertainment.
pros: Unlimited free movie tickets (₹300 each per ₹10K spend)
20% off on food and beverages at PVR
Free access to PVR INOX In-Cinema Lounges
cons: Rent, wallet, gaming excluded from milestone

rewards.name: Cashback
rewards.earningText: 7.5% instant discount on Myntra (capped ₹750/txn). 5% cashback on Swiggy, Cleartrip, PVR, Urban Company (capped ₹1,000/month). 1.25% cashback on all other online/offline/UPI spends.
rewards.expiry: Cashback credited within 30 days. Never expires once credited.
rewards.joiningBonus: ₹500 Myntra voucher on first ₹500+ transaction within 30 days. Complimentary Myntra Insider Select membership.
rewards.exclusions: Rent, Wallet, Fuel, Insurance, Utility, Govt, Education above ₹70K, Online Gaming excluded from cashback. UPI cashback only on transactions ≥₹2,000.

calculator.specialLogic: DISCONTINUED as of July 10, 2025. Existing cardholders migrated to Kotak League Platinum or Zen Signature. Card features: 7.5% INSTANT DISCOUNT at Myntra checkout (max ₹750/transaction, unlimited transactions). 5% cashback on partner brands (Swiggy, Cleartrip, PVR, Urban Company) capped at ₹1,000/month. 1.25% unlimited cashback on all other spends including UPI (min ₹2,000/txn for UPI).

movies.text: 5% cashback at PVR. 2 free PVR tickets on ₹50K quarterly spend.

metadata.bestFor: Frequent Myntra shoppers seeking instant checkout discounts (CARD DISCONTINUED)
metadata.verdict: DISCONTINUED (July 2025). Was an excellent co-branded card with highest 7.5% Myntra discount and strong partner cashback. Existing cardholders migrated to League Platinum or Zen Signature.
pros: 7.5% instant discount on Myntra (highest among fashion cards)
5% cashback on Swiggy, Cleartrip, PVR, Urban Company
Low ₹500 annual fee with ₹2L waiver option
